mean_cn: v. 破坏组织；搅乱秩序；使混乱；破坏组织
mean_en: to disrupt or break up the order, arrangement, or system of; throw into confusion or disorder
sentence: It takes me weeks to organize my closet, but only minutes to disorganize it.
sentence_trans: 整理我的衣柜要花几周，但是打乱它只要几分钟。
word_etyma: dis相反 + organize组织 → disorganize破坏组织
